1: Review: Just had a amazing dinner with a friend first time we ever went to this lovely place . Lovely staff we were served by Angelita and Easter. Such a lovely people definitely will be back very soon hopefully. Thanks alot guys .
2: Review: Best meal close to London Bridge! We wandered by one evening in a hunt to find an excellent place to have dinner. We had no reservation and they got us the best table by the meat area with a gorgeous mirror on top of us. The experience was incredible from start to finish—delightful and attentive staff, courteous and on point. The food was delicious. I would definitely come back.
3: Review: My experience here was like Karen's diner but the waitresses aren't paid to be horrible, they just are. It was my grandma's 80th birthday trip and we arrived for our final meal excited for the great food and atmosphere ahead, how wrong we were! They didn't provide us with a warm welcome whatsoever, they made us feel like we were a problem from the minute we arrived. They didn't crack one smile, were extremely cold and rude and they spent most of their shift laughing and bitching about us like school girls. They made faces to each other which we could obviously see they were making about us when we would try to engage in conversation with them and lighten the mood. A PRE-WARNING - they stabbed our steak knives into the table extremely close to our fingers (this may be triggering for some people and there was no warning). I'm aware that this may be part of the steakhouse dining experience but in combination with their disgusting attitude towards us it felt rather threatening on the night. Unfortunately, they lead a member of our party to leave early due to the way they made him feel and ruined the final evening we had in London together. I have worked in hospitality myself and can understand the difficulty of the job sometimes but we were not hard customers, we just came to have a good time and were hoping they would look after our fabulous grandmother but that is not what they had in mind. Despite our experience, it at least gave us all a laugh to look back on for Nan's last meal of her fabulous trip.
4:
Review: Passed here by chance
Delightful dinner and amazing staff!! Steaks and zeppola dessert were fantastic
We will be definitely back
5: Title: T-Bone Steak we got was much smaller compared other services at the restaurant

Review: We had a T-Bone steak and the cut appears to be less than 900 gram and it was more on the sirloin and very little filet tenderloin. We were tourist and went to this restaurant for steak because it was recommended by the concierge at the hotel. We saw the the four guests across from us who had two T-bone steak to share. Seeing the steaks, we (myself, wife and daughter) decided to change our bone in ribeyes 650 gram to 350 gram one )along with our T-bone steak (British). Very disappointing experience and felt like we were in a tourist trap.
6: Review: Personale gentile , carne e primi buono poca scelta. Locale ampio forse troppo rumoroso musica alta. Location riservata
7: Title: Excellent food, atmosphere and service

Review: Great place all-round! Service is friendly and everything is well-explained, and the food was wonderful. Only thing to note is that it can end up quite expensive as they charge a lot for bread and water. Nonetheless I would definitely recommend and would visit again!
8: Review: Not knowing much about the restaurant and finding it by chance, it then came as a polite surprise to find this hidden gem. It was a quiet, late Tuesday afternoon and understandably the place was quiet also. However, that’s not to detract from my experience. I felt welcomed by the manager, who recommended the tiramisu to settle my sweet tooth. She even offered a complementary limoncello! Although not one for writing reviews, when someone does go out of their way to make your small visit as welcomed as I felt, the least I can do is share some feedback! Grazie!
9: Title: Better Italian options in the area

Review: Went here for a business dinner because the restaurant got such great reviews online. It has a lot of potential. Quirky location with unique design. Service was fair but that is not unusual in London. Not a lot of menu choices. I had the ravioli. Portion was very small, especially for the price. Wine was also priced high. Don’t think I would go back as there are better options in the area.
10: Review: Great food, superb services!Best steak in London so far and the guys there made the visit even better. I will go there again - 100%
11: Review: We had an unexpected night in Southwark, exploring a little alley we found this absolute delight. Food and service were totally sublime!
12:
Review: the whole experience is excelent,  very nice service and perfect steak,
 we had a perfwct evening, I will come back to this hidden GEM
13: Review: Credo che Roberto sia un imprenditore e un ristoratore di grande classe e umanità!!!! Grazie perché il tuo altruismo ha oltrepassato di gran lunga la bontà e la qualità che si possono trovare nel tuo ristorante!Ci tengo a dire che a Londra non sono mai venuta ma qualora il mio desiderio si avverasse giuro che un salto ce lo faremo sicuramente!Verrò da te ma anche a casa Sibilla altro ristorante pieno di autenticità e italianità!Mi hai fatto emozionare.Ci vorrebbero più persone come te.Lucia
14: Title: Una delle migliori fiorentine mai mangiate

Review: Qualità dei prodotti accompagnata da un approccio alla cucina che tocca gli ingredienti il minimo. Tutto ottimo, dalle battute, carpaccio e salumi alla fiorentina e ai dolci (sorprendente la panna cotta al basilico). Vincente anche l'idea di associare la steakhouse alla bakery ligure (da provare la focaccia di Recco). Torneremo sicuramente.
15: Title: Ottima carne ma vino troppo caro

Review: Bel locale ,staff super accogliente e preparato per italiani e non , super professionali. Buona qualità della carne e dei dolci. Unica pecca negativa , il Vino . Prezzi esorbitanti . Ordinato una bottiglia di Pèppoli 2019 costo medio in uk 15 pound , sulla carta venduta a 56 poundOra capisco tutto avrei accettato questo vino (base antinnori) a 25-30 pound , ma a 56 pound vuol dire che vuoi farci dei guadagni esorbitantiPer chi ama accompagnare la carne ad un buon vino sconsigliato Per il resto una bella esperienza
16:
Review: Staff were so friendly and had such good recommendations.  Wine was amazing and food some of the best in London for the price.  

I will be visiting this branch again and should be proud of what you have.
17: Review: Went there with friends on a last-minute whim at around 9pm in the evening on a Friday night and luckily they had a lovely table upstairs for the four of us. As two of us were very hungry, we ordered quite a few dishes to share:Starters:Focaccia : I was expecting a fluffy focaccia but what came was what looked like a very flat, thin pizza, which was not worth the price. Beef tongue : delicious, I would order again. Beef heart : equally delicious, and I would also order again. Bone marrow : the beef tartare on top of the bone marrow is overpowering; I much rather have the marrow on its own (which was delicious) and the tartar on the side. Truffle tagliatelle : there's a separate small truffle menu and we ordered the tagliatelle - it was basically a bowl of taglitelle which did not much sauce at all erring on the dry side - then the waitress came over with a weighing scale and truffle, weighed the truffle before and after she shaved some on the pasta for you to understand how much you have just spent ;-). This was the most disappointingly bland dish I have ever had and will never order anything from that truffle menu again. Mains:Beef rib steak : super delicious but do note down the weight as price is /100gr.Baby chicken : delicious but somewhat lonely without any side dishes. Overall, steak was definitely the best choice. Most of the starters were delicious but I would definitely not order focaccia nor truffle-dishes again.
18: Review: Очень понравилась еда и обслуживание.Мы заказали два мясных блюда, пицу для мясонеядящих пиво и что странное на дисерт .все было очень вкусноРекомендую.
19: Review: Second visit to this excellent Italian steakhouse on Londons South Bank. The beef heart starter was amazing,  the tartare with gorgonzola excellent and the beef rib perfect. The staff are excellent, very friendly and attentive. An exceptional meal.
20: Title: Wonderful food - make sure you are hungry.

Review: We had been at the next door restaurant the night before and the waiter there suggested this one for the next time. We were very glad they did. I had the steak with Parmesan and my partner had the flat bread pizza. We watched other tables being served amazing cuts of meat and wished we could eat more. My steak was some of the best meat I have had and went perfectly with the Parmesan and rocket. The flatbread pizza was also great. Like the next door restaurant, for us it was all a bit loud partly because of the acoustics from the brick arches. But the food was wonderful. The waiting staff were friendly and knowledgeable. We will be back next time we are in London.
21: Review: One of the best Italian restaurants you will come across in London. Brilliant location on union suit in Southwark, perfectly nestled away from the busy streets among a row of restaurants, great atmosphere and absolutely outstanding service, so much so that I am now a regular.Friendly and professional staff who always make me feel welcome.Very knowledgeable about their food and wine, but won't make you feel awkward if you aren't an expert.Ive never gone out of my way to make a review for anyone but they have absolutely earnt it.Had a great conversation with the manager who spent some time to speak to me which again is a rare occurance in any hospitality industry.Will be back!!!
22: Title: Terrible Value, think a lot of reviews on here are fake

Review: I went here with a group of friends for dinner. Two of us ordered a steak to share and they said the minimum size was 700g, which we said was fine we’d have that. They then brought us a steak and said it was nearly 1kg and was that ok, we said no, too big, that would’ve been £82 just for a steak. They then brought a second one which was only slightly smaller, and said it was difficult to get them any smaller than that because of the bone. If that’s the case, why say the minimum is 700g? It felt very much like the sort of place where they just wanted to milk money out of us. The wine list was only available through a QR code and the cheapest bottle available was £35, so we had that and it wasn’t great wine, the sort you’d pay £6 for in the supermarket. Our steaks came and were much, much rarer than ordered. We ordered our big steak medium rare and it was essentially blue - it was stone cold in the middle and raw. Our friend ordered his steak medium and had to send it back it was so rare - and when it came back it was still undercooked but now also tough and flavourless. The chips were soft and not very nice at all - I’ve had better chips in fast food places. We ended up asking for the service to be taken off the bill because the whole meal felt such bad value - though we felt bad because it wasn’t really the staff’s fault, it’s just a bad restaurant. Even without service we paid £60 each for two courses with one bottle of wine between four of us. There are many, many places in London which do the same food as this restaurant but much better and for much lower prices. Very disappointed, would not go again. Don’t go.
23: Review: Not very good. First of all, the wine list is exceptionally expensive but also missing prices, which makes purchasing wine awkward. Second, we ordered a sharing steak. Despite being told that there would be 700g available and ordering that, we were presented with a 940g. When we suggested we wanted what we ordered, they went away and brought back a 800g. That was still wrong by a large margin but we felt we had to go with it. When the steaks arrived they were bigly undercooked. One of our party sent his back to be cooked more, but they told us they just did this by putting it in the oven and when it returned it had lost flavour. We were too scared to do the same with our sharing steak. The chips leave much to be desired. Cooked unevenly and bad. Staff generally dismissive though some were OK, which is alright. Location slightly odd. Overall would not recommend.
24: Review: Fabulous meal. We shared a starter carpaccio with courgettes. I had a,cheese dish with Parma ham. And a side salad. The wine is not cheap but excellent. Very good service
25: Review: Very much a meat based restaurant. We shared a starter . Carpaccio with courgette. I had a cheese dish with Parma ham delicious.  The wine is not cheap but very good
26: Title: A real Italian run by real Italians

Review: A real Italian run by real Italians full of real Italians. We just stopped by for s late night snack. Focaccia excellent as was pissa. Really different from the usual high st stuff and totally authentic.
27: Review: I’ve been in this restaurant once before lockdown and now that I’ve visited during COVID 19 I have to say that the quality and the service is on a top level .Marios took good care of me and my partner during the dinner and showed us ,with evidently great experience ,everything that we were looking for and also gave us more information about the Type of meat that we were choosing and suggested also on wine a perfect combine for our plates .Very happy and surely I’ll come back !!!
28: Review: Costata indubbiamente molto buona, buon servizio e locale gradevole... non economico ma si sa che la costata non è un piatto a buon mercato!
29: Review: Absolutely amazing Steak! The food here is exquisite, go hungry and have one of the fantastic starters too! Very clean, very friendly and attentive staff, loved every moment and will definitely be back!
30: Review: Camilla - her service was superb, very prepared about dishes, very kind. The quality of food was amazing. Definitely worth it.
31: Title: Mediocre meat, nearly no Covid measures

Review: We tried this restaurant for the first time this week, the reviews said it was great and we were in the area so thought we'd give it a go.The only Covid measure in place was a small bottle of hand sanitiser on the front desk - there were no measures in place in the rest of the restaurant, staff were 'wearing' masks but under their noses or just not wearing them at all, the toilets still had both male cubicles in use, with no hand sanitiser at all, and there was barely 1m between tables, with 3 other people being seated in tables that were literally next to us, despite the restaurant having more room. A member of staff also sat just outside the restaurant smoking, which was disgusting since the whole front of the restaurant was open, leading to smoke going across us while we were trying to eat.The food we had was great, until it came to the mains. There was a weird show of testosterone as the server stabbed our steak knives into the table, which seems like an immensely bad idea during a pandemic, since there's no way all of the small holes in the table could have been cleaned well. My partner's steak was decent, but very small and no better than a good quality supermarket steak. I opted for the lamb, which was over-cooked, a bit chewy, and lacked any flavour at all. Not the quality I would have expected for the price.Overall I definitely wouldn't come back here, especially with the absolute lack of Covid measures. The emphasis seems to be on theatrics rather than good food and service.
32: Title: Great! Expect plenty of beef

Review: Great! Expect plenty of beef and cheese and not much more. Hoke made focaccia is thinner than the one you usually know. Amazing! Had excellent home made pasta with ragout. Didn’t want to stop eating. Live music helped giving this a great touch. Shared 650 grams of steak. Outstanding meat quality and fair prices! Service was top notch. Tiramisu rocked. Need to try their other desserts next ti e.
33: Title: MIghty Meaty! Fabulous wait staff too

Review: Quality meat, people and attention. We just stumbled upon this place- what a great little gem. My filet was perfect- and my husband just went wild for his pasta ( and he rarely gets hyper dramatic over food. Loved my glass of super Tuscan wine- and the chocolate cake was not heavy but not a mouse either.. somewhere between a brownie and cake and just wonderful. Oh yes, loved the bean soup too. Surprised and happy about this neighborhood gem down an unpromising alley near the theater.
34: Title: Best Italian steakhouse in London

Review: The food is just amazing but what's even more amazing is the staff! They know what they are serving, they are helpful and super nice --> professional.The quality of the meat is excellent, they explain everything when it comes to the cut of the meat and where it comes from.They also serve super tasty homemade focaccia!
35: Title: Excellent food and fantastic staff

Review: Macellaio is definitely the best Italian steak house in London. The staff is so friendly and know what they are talking about which makes a huge difference. If you are up for good steak and a glass of Italian wine, this is the place!Their homemade focaccia is a delight! Definitely a must-try!
36: Title: IL MIGLIORE, MA NON AVEVO DUBBI

Review: Non avevo dubbi a riguardo... Location originalissima e pulitissima. Atmosfera familiare e tranquilla. Frigorifero con le carni fresche a vista. Personale preparato e molto professionale. Ci siamo affidati ai loro consigli prendendo in due una fassona da 1 kg. Dopo averci mostrato la carne scelta e dopo averci anche consigliato la cottura, ci siamo trovati a mangiare la carne più morbida e saporita che avevamo mai mangiato prima. Consigliatissimo!!!
37: Review: Carne ottima, veramente buona ma carissima..!!In coppia abbiamo preso:2 antipasti: bresaola con mozzarella - tartare1 tagliata divisa in due di carne bovina2 flûte di prosecco1 acquaTot: 140€ (2 persone)
38: Review: La Fiorentina a Londra, una cosa che non avrei mai pensato fosse possibile, invece mi sbagliavo.Questo posto e fantastico, carne cucinata da dio e soprattutto carne frollata di prima scelta.Il vino anche è il top. Posto accogliente e personale gentile e disponibile.
39: Review: Il Macellaio is a place where you can find various types of delicious high quality meat, perfectly cooked and well served. We have tried the Battuta all'Albese as starter and a Fiorentina as main and both were delicious.The staff are very professional and friendly and they can help you on the selection of food and drinks. They have beers and a large selection of itralian high quality wines.Highly recommended....at least once in your life :)
40: Review: Très beau restaurant .Accueil chaleureux . Très bon plats ...tout êtes bon comme à la maison ...et la viande divine !!!
41: Title: Cena con amici davvero bella,
Review: Cena con amici davvero bella, ottima carne e ottimo servizio. Location davvero bella, ci ritorneremo sicuramente
42: Review: Ottima carne, cucinata molto bene.. ottimo anche il contorno, nulla da eccepire. Location anche molto piacevole
43: Review: Cena ottima e qualità della carne molto alta!! tutto nel complesso buonissimo, antipasti e carne. L'unica pecca è che non ci è stata consigliata a sufficienza la quantità di carne da mangiare infatti non è stata abbastanza da saziare tutti i presenti a tavola. Abbiamo ordinato 1200 grammi per 4 persone ma fondamentalmente un 500 grammi erano di osso. Per il resto ottimo, anche il contorno delle patate al forno ma a mio parere conto eccessivamente salato per la quantità di cibo mangiato
44: Title: お肉のレストラン
Review: ステーキももちろんおいしかったですが、前菜の、生ハムの盛り合わせが好きでした。ワインによくあいます。ちょっと小さな道を入ったところにあります。
45: Review: Bravi ragazzi, seconda volta che vengo in questo ristorante ed entrambe ho mangiato benissimo. In italia avrei dato un 4 ma poiché qui a Londra è difficile mangiare bene, allora ho deciso di dare il massimo.Carne buonissima, ma anche come viene presentata, anche la cottura è stata come richiesta, solo il n po fredda. Ottimo il servizio, personale gentile e simpaticoConsiglio vivamente e sicuramente ci ritornerò.
46: Review: We have been here for a dinner with friends and we liked all the food and the meat, service friendly and professional.
47: Review: Siamo entrati in questo locale dalle ottime recensioni e su consiglio di amici, appena arrivati abbiamo notato di aver già visto questo locale nel programma di Alessandro Borghese, questo ha portato noi ad avere alte aspettative della cena. Bel locale, molto curato nei dettagli, ottima carne ma non va servita così.... se pago una bistecca da 1.2Kg di Fiorentina la voglio mangiare calda e succosa, mentre arriva al tavolo già fredda e finché la si finisce diventa ghiacciata. Per questo motivo è un bel NO a questo posto. Peccato perché la qualità e ottima ma non va servita così, e non siamo stati gli unici nel locale a lamentarsi di questa mancanza
48: Review: Abbiamo cenato la sera di capodanno in questo locale.Cibo davvero ottimo e posto molto carino, prezzi secondo me leggermente sopra la norma.
49: Review: sono stato due volte a mangiare a questo ristorante in sei giorni. La qualità della carne e degli altri prodotti consumati è eccezionale meglio di tanti ristoranti in Italia. Certo la qualità si paga in Italia figuriamoci a Londra. Ma posso dire di aver mangiato una delle migliori costate della mia vita. Anche contorni e dolci sono buonissimi. Straconsiglio pannacotta al basilico.
50: Review: Locale molto carino, la ragazza capo/sala molto brava e professionale nella spiegazione dei vari tipi di carne offerta, focaccia ottima e carne SUPER , prezzi/qualita giusti.
51: Review: Posto veramente carino ed originale. Personale gentile e affidabile. Sono stato qui con la mia famiglia il 29 dicembre ed ho mangiato benissimo (Fiorentina di 1.4kg e costata 600g) con vino rosso e dolci per concludere. Considerate la quantità, la qualità dei prodotti e i prezzi di Londra, il prezzo è congruo.
52: Review: Als tip meegekregen van een collega en zeker geen spijt van. Heerlijk genoten van een goed stuk vlees. Goed bereid en de kleine dingetjes doen het hem, zoals het serveren, uitleg over het menu, van te voren het gekozen stuk vlees laten “keuren”, kortom een top avond!
53: Title: Booked a weekend lunch here

Review: Booked a weekend lunch here and while we really enjoyed ourselves, it is sad that we were pretty much the only people in the restaurant. It is hidden down a side street off Union Street, and while only about a 10 minute walk from busy Borough Market, there is not much passing pedestrian traffic. The restaurant decor is really nice - it is in a railway arch, interesting paintings, wall hangings, lighting and an eclectic mix of tables and chairs. There is an upstairs but we stayed downstairs all the time. The service was fine - I would have been very surprised if it wasn’t, given that we were alone. We both had the beef carpacccio starter, mine was plain, served with black pepper and olive oil, while my friend’s was served with tiny pieces of whipped goats’ cheese. We both really enjoyed it. She had a ragu pasta dish while I had a mini pizza type thing, again with fluffy light cheese and prosciutto crudo. Both were very enjoyable. We had glasses of the house montepulciano which was fine. The bill was not horrendous and we had a lovely relaxing lunch on a cold and windy afternoon.
54: Review: Abbiamo cennato con amici e devo dire che nel complesso il ristorante e molto buono e curato, Il cibo di qualità (nulla di stravagante) Essendo della zona di Genova, posso dire che la focaccia al formaggio (di reco) e sicuramente fatta benne. Non abbiamo mangiato nulla sulla griglia, ma ho visto passare piati ben fatti. Per il servizio sicuramente ce spazio di miglioramento. Utilizzo del impianto di ricircolo d'aria non e stato utilizzato a pieno, infatti siamo usciti con abiti impregnati. Comunque cibo molto buono. raccomando
55: Title: cibo ottimo, il servizio però deve essere più attento

Review: siamo venuti in questo ristorante memori di 4 ristoranti, ho apprezzato molto la posizione, il locale ed il fatto che tutto il personale parla perfettamente italiano (fa sempre piacere stare tra "paesani")molto buona la focaccia e il prosciutto sopra di essa, la carne ottima (sia fiorentina che costata) però i camerieri hanno lasciato per più di 5 minuti la carne sul bancone della comanda senza portarla al tavolo LA CARNE VA MANGIATA BOLLENTE. un ristorante di carne di questa qualità non può commettere questi erroriper scusarci hanno poi offerto degli ottimi dolci. da rivedere i fagioliin 4, con il vino, abbiamo speso 340 €a londra ci può stare benissimo, forse ci tornerei anche ma per le 5 palline doveva essere tutto perfetto
56: Title: Food great, but it's the service that scores top marks

Review: This place serves my favourite sicilian moretti, always a winner. The food is not complicated, just delicious. We had gnocchi in cheese sauce (very filling) tagiatelle with ragu (devoured by my daughter) ravioli (nice and firm but meat a bit grissly) and a cheese filled pissa (like a light stuffed pizza). But what made the evening was how lovely the staff were and especially to my 7 year old. Top marks and thank you.
57: Review: Amazing food and even better service. It was our first time in Macellaio and I would definitely recommend it to my friends. Only disappointment was that my boyfriends stake arrived almost cold and starter carpacio was sliced in quiet thik pieces, we still enjoyed it as meat was very good. Big thank you to servers as they are doing great job in there
58: Review: We just had a fabulous meal. The steak was gorgeous; one of the best we’ve had (florentina 870g between 2). We had some gorgeous sides- mashed potato and spinach, and bruschetta to start. Everything was delicious. The waitress suggested a wine local to where the meat was from which was really delicious and I will be buying again. Service was great too. It’s in a fairly nondescript railway arch and pretty casual but the food and service are both first rate and would recommend for a date night or if you’re a meat fan. Will be back.
59: Review: Refeição para dois. A carne era óptima e os raviollis estavam muito bons. Vinho italiano. Sobremesas muito boas. A repetir
60: Title: Disappointed experience for such a bill!

Review: I visited the restaurant for dinner. I came with high expectations and my expectations were raised with entrance to the restaurant as it was such a nice atmosphere and friendly welcoming. However, the food was a total disappointment. We ordered butcher salad, some fillet steak to share, roasted potatoes and spinach on the side and finally Tiramisu as desert. Let me start with Fillet steak. It came cold and when we asked the waitress she said because it is cooked in low heat to have medium-rare then we asked to be cooked a bit more. But again the meat came cold. We thought it was not freshly cooked, perhaps cooked earlier to serve. The side dishes were very plain, spinach was just simply boiled and served without and other flavours. Moreover, they were expensive for what you get. Tiramisu was full of cream but almost nothing else. Paying that much money for a dinner and getting total disappointment was the summary of my experience. My 2 stars go to waitress as she was nice and friendly.
61: Review: Ristorante italiano dall'atmosfera curata ed accattivante tra l'industrial ed il vintage con chiarissimi riferimenti al nostro Paese. Originalissima la postazione del macellaio che taglia i pezzi di carne richiesti dai clienti.Personale italiano, professionale e cortese; la cosa più importante ovviamente è l'ottima qualità della carne: noi abbiamo preso una costata da 1kg accompagnata da patate al forno e cavolo... davvero eccezionale. Buonissimi anche i dolci.Il conto è a mio parere onesto visto che la qualità si paga. Consigliato.
62: Review: I spent a wonderful evening in the company of a great staff, I ate good meat and drank some excellent wine, I think I'll come back as soon as possible
63: Title: ne avrei messe 6 di stelle

Review: tutto stupendo in questo ristorante VERAMENTE ECCELLENTE ed Italiano.Carne che viene dal Piemonte frollata a Londra. Preso un antipasto tartare di carne con gorgonzola che me lo ricordo come un'esperienza mistica.Presa una porzione di carne stupenda la più buona mai mangiata sino ad oggi. Aggiunto un buon dolce.Se ha vinto il primo premio Alessandro Borghese di 4 ristoranti italiani a Londra ci sta un perché.Consigliatissimo andarci come vedere un monumento.
64: Review: Avevamo visto questo posto in una puntata di Quattro Ristoranti, perciò andando a Londra e volendo fare una cena più seria abbiamo deciso di andare in questo ristorante. Carne eccellente, veramente buonissima. I dolci sono pazzeschi, consiglio davvero tanto la Cheesecake, mai mangiata così buona, anche il tiramisù, molto buono, si sente che sono proprio le creme fatte da dio. Personale super gentile, attento e la cameriera era super simpatica. Il prezzo un po' ci ha lasciati con l'amaro in bocca: ovviamente avevamo calcolato che essendo a Londra il prezzo non era sicuramente quello che avremmo pagato in Italia, però era veramente altissimo a mio parere (calcolando, come ho già detto, che abbiamo mangiato carne che normalmente costa, buona e che eravamo in una delle città più costose d'Europa). Di sicuro lo consiglierei come ristorante, ma solo se volete mangiare una cosetta e dividerla o se siete veramente pieni di soldi, sennò rischiate di uscire spennati.
65: Review: This has to be one of the best meals out we have had in a long time. We dined outside as the weather in mid-September was very mild. My wife had the beef heart starter - absolutely excellent - and I had beef tartare with gorgonzola. These great starters were followed by really good quality, well cooked steak and a lovely chocolate pudding. Very friendly staff and good well priced one completed a lovely night out. We'll definitely be dining at one of their restaurants again next time we are near one.
66: Review: Io e mia moglie abbiamo cenato in questo ristorante invogliati dall’ottima impressione fattaci dal programma “4 ristoranti”.Beh che dire, vittoria meritatissima! Le materie prime sono italiane al 100% e cucinate in modo superbo, lo staff molto preparato e disponibile. Il prezzo giusto, data la qualità delle materie prime.CONSIGLIATO.
67: Title: Great steakhouse, superb quality meat

Review: Really nice atmosphere in this Italian steak place. Menu very unusual. You have to eat meat basically. Starters and bread good, some starters bit small. For main we did one big piece to share, perfectly cooked. Sides ok, not great. A bit pricey, but worth it. Service good
68: Review: Sono stato a mangiare in questo locale a Southwark, che dire, la carne e' la regina, ma ci sono anche gli antipasti nonche' la battuta di fassona. Ottima la selezione dei vini.
69: Review: We got an amazing dinner, meat was excellent, we really enjoy the while atmosphere, and Emanuela been really nice, professional and sweet with all of us! Thank you! Proper dinner for our last night in London, a bug advice to all people coming to have a taste of proper Italian meat!
70: Title: At least get the meat right...!

Review: I have come here with quite high expectations having read the largely positive reviews. But I must admit that I am extremely disappointed:- the prices on the online menu are not at all comparable to the ones you end up paying (a starter at 5.50 GBP vs 13 GBP). This would not have stopped me, BUT- above all, the meat was a shame. No way of getting it cooked to what I have ordered: I ordered Medium, received almost it blue, sent it to the kitchen for another turn and got it back well done. If you claim to be a specialty restaurant, get your specialty right. Especially if you are quite overpriced.Will not go back and would not recommend.
71: Review: We walked in on a speculative booking having decided we didn't like the menu at our booked restaurant around the corner. They could fit us in on the sharing tables in the centre of the restaurant.I have been to this restaurant and also their one in Exmouth Market and must say I love it every time.Great steak (obviously), interesting sides, really good wine list and fun atmosphere. They certainly didn't mind 5 old school friends enjoying themselves :)The 5 of us were looked after by the manager, who I must say was fantastic (hope you enjoyed your cocktail!).If you are in the area and fancy a great steak (or even a traditional Italian pizza (yes they have their own bakery at this branch, although I cannot vouch for the pizza not having had one here) then 100% worth a visit!Recommended
72: Review: Atmosfera molto cool, divertente il tavolo comune. Ottima pizza da accompagnare il pasto principale. Ottima scelta di carne. Limitata scelta di vini: per il bianco raccomando il Sauvignon del Friuli con una buona qualità prezzo.
73: Review: Leuk interieur. Italiaanse vleesgerechten. Prijs, kwaliteit aan de dure kant. Je vraagt best groenten apart bij, ook apart bij te betalen. Lekker huisgemaakt desserts. Vriendelijke bediening.
74: Review: Siamo stati 2 volte per cena in questo bel posto, locale molto bello, cibo di ottima qualità, come a casa nostra antipasto di affettati fantastico , pizza buonissima , costata di manzo fantastica, pasta come a casa , servizio veloce e di qualità, simpatia unica !!!! Tornerò sicuramente!!
75: Review: sono stata in questo ristorante a febbraio, sono rimasta affascinata dalla diversità di carne che offrono e dalla frollatura fatta in modo perfetto.ambiente molto carino e casual.carne STUPEFACENTE!
76: Title: Bella atmosfera e ottima carne

Review: Abbiamo trovato questo locale per caso e ne siamo stato subito attratti. Arredato in modo caratteristico ed elegante.Ottima accoglienza, molto disponibile il personale e attento a soddisfare le esigenze dei clienti.Tutto buonissimo quello che abbiamo mangiato e la carne di ottima qualità e cucinata con maestria.Un po' cari ci sono sembrati i prezzi dei vini ma d'altra parte siamo a Londra ...
77: Review: What a wonderful restaurant. Set in a very pretty location just off Union Street this restaurant really impressed me. The staff were very knowledgable and friendly. The food was just delicious. One of the best fillet steaks I have eaten. The bill for drinks, main course and dessert came to £72.65 including service and well worth it.
78: Review: It was not what I was expecting. Had a table booked at 730 and managed to leave the place at 1000pm. The service was extremely slow and I felt sorry for the waitress upstairs. She was alone all night dealing with over 30 guests. Never saw the manager up there to support. I went to celebrate my son’s birthday and the only positive thing was that he loved the chocolate cake. Really disappointed.
79: Title: Séjour en famille à Londres

Review: Excellent restaurant Accueil, cadre et qualité sont aux rendez-vous.Si vous aimez la viande de bœuf ou les pâtes, c’est le lieu où ce rendre.Encore merci à l’équipe pour son accueil et sa gentillesse.
80: Title: top-quality meat and nice staff

Review: I visited with a group of friends and we had a lovely meal. I would particularly recommend the battuta all’albese, fillet and fiorentina steak (try to get all of these because they’re absolutely sublime). It’s not a place for a cheap meal but the quality is worth the price.
81:
Review: Gran bella serata a Londra ..
Il macellaio top.
Ottima carne ..
Frullatura top
Cotta in modo sublime..
Ci ritornerò...
82: Review: Abbiamo cenato in questo posto sapendo della bontà della carne. Come antipasto abbiamo optato per una piadina con stracchino e prosciutto crudo per poi ordinare un taglio di carne. La carne e’ morbida e saporita, una vera goduria per le papille gustative. Assolutamente da provare !
83: Review: In London for just one night, we were staying close by and looking for a nice restaurant as it was our wedding anniversary. I found Macellaio online and so glad I did. Our experience of Italian steaks had been good with the best living long in our memories at a restaurant along Lake Maggiore. Happy to say our experience of Macellaio will join that memory. Opting for the sharing table, the ambience was good. Service was excellent with lots of knowledge and pride in their offering. Our steaks were simply sublime. To impress my husband who has not ordered steak for a long time because he was constantly being disappointed was the icing on the cake. Loved that you can see the meat and the preparation. Top restaurant. Thank you
84: Review: Is not so easy to find a good fiorentina steak in London so we decided to give it at try to this restaurant famous for the fiorentina steak. We ordered in two 1kg of fiorentina and two sides, the steak quality was perfect like the one I have tried before in Florence, the restaurant atmosphere it’s a bit too rustic-chic for me. The room was a bit smelly of smoke but this is probably coming from outside due to open windows because the air system looks new and perfectly working. I think this restaurant deserve 5 stars and the price (fiorentina is not cheap even in italy) is quite reasonable.
85: Review: What a great find. We had 4 courses here and thoroughly enjoyed every one of them. The value for money was really good for central London. The staff were brilliant and even a small issue with the wine was sorted quickly and more than satisfactorily.Will certainly be back for some meat as it looked fantastic.
86: Review: I came to this place with high expectation and being italian my standards are quite high. Good place to eat in a nice environment. The meat is of a very good quality, but probably quite expensive. Amazing "battuto di Fassona with Gorgonzola" as a startera and very good "focaccia di Recco". I also took a 700gr Costata, Grappa and Dolcetto d'alba to drink: 78 pounds of expence.Good experience, yes, but I did not come again.
87: Review: Super Qualität und sehr freundlicher Service! Wir waren mit zwei Kindern da und  wir haben uns willkommen gefühlt. Danke
88: Review: Nous avons choisis pour les avis et envie de resto italien pas trop loin de notre hotel Tres bien accueillis .Nous avion envie de viande et le serveur m a demandé de venir avec lui pour me montrer les différents choix.Avec explications sur le t bone steak en plusLes enfants ont aussi choisis un plateau avec fromageC était très bien avec une bonne bouteille de vin italienL addition est un peu forte mais la qualité était bien la
89: Review: Outstandingly tasty, perfectly presented northern Italian cuisine is what we found here. The calves liver with mash was simply devine, the pizza was delicious, the pesto pasta was equally good too.The service was informed and attentive and the interior quirky and clean.The star of the show for all of us was the latte dolce fritto... a stunning little dessert and very highly recommended.One thing to note is that the portions are small and had we known this we'd all had a starter!
90: Title: Posto con un ottima atmosfera!

Review: Per caso cercando un locale vicino all hotel abbiamo trovato qst vieta piena di localini. Subito per atmosfera e gentilezza del personale lo abbiamo scelto. Ottima carne, buoni contorni e dolci. A me nn è piaciuta molto la focaccia che fanno con Il formaggio, ma io nn sono molto per il formaggio. L unica cosa un po' altini i prezzi ma calcolando che sono come un ristorante di livello medio alto in Italia. Comunque almeno una sera consigliatissimo! Ahhh naturalmente si paga il servizio.
91: Review: I can not fault the location, vide, food or service. Waitress knew her stuff, beef was excellent and sides perfect. We shared Steak Carpaccaio & Steak Tartare to start, then a huge and extremely satisfying rib eye steak. Prices are not bad, especially for the quality, and easily on par, if not better than Hawksmore or Smith & Wollensky.
92: Review: Very nice restaurant in a cool area with top service. Delicious food, great steaks. 100% Recommendation!
93: Review: Steaks were no more than average.So many better places to eat steak in London. The side dishes were dreadful. Fennel and orange salad was chopped fennel with orange segments on top no dressing or anything. The red cabbage was simply raw shredded cabbage with nothing even to dress it.Flat Iron steakhouse was way better than here let alone what they would consider their peer group like Hawksmoor..
94: Review: Best steak I have had in the UK, very close to one I love in Barcelona. We had with a side of cabbage and chips. Both great, but a few more side options, such as green salad would be nice.Breads are equally great here.Great decor and atmosphere. Will go again.
95: Review: Tutto ottimo dalla costata ai dessert. Si vede che si presta attenzione ad offrire prodotti di qualità. Il personale è stato molto cortese e competente. Il locale è bello. Abbiamo prenotato immediatamente un'altra serata.
96: Title: Only restaurant we visited twice!
Review: Wow! I don’t post reviews but I must as this amazing little restaurant blew us away...twice. BIG thanks to the hosts, chefs and servers for the most delicious and memorable experience.
97: Title: Totally bad experience on our 2nd anniversary

Review: My wife and I decided to celebrate our 2nd Anniversary to Macellaio, Union Street.On arrival the table was not ready and their booking in the system was also different compare with mine one. I did book 7.45pm but for them my booking was at 8.15pm. Sounds weird. While we were waiting for the table the Manager ask us to have a drink in the meanwhile so, we sat down outside but unfortunately anyone came to us to take the order until the table was ready. Overall the waiting time was miserable too long considering that was Monday and the restaurant was not busy at all. We called the waiter to take our order otherwise anyone was considering us and just the waiting time for 2 simple glasses of wine was unacceptable. Due to kitchen electricity down the starters were served after 25 min but again anyone came to us reporting any kitchen issue earlier. However at least the quality of the food was excellent. After finished our dinner we were expecting someone to offer us the desert but again I had to call the waiter and ask for the menù and also the bill. After the the lady to who I have asked the bill went to polish the cutlery and the Manager deliver the us the bill after nearly 10 min. By the time there was only 4 table in restaurant. We felt like not wanted and this is not a very good sensation because, quality food on the side, looks like having a normal dinner at home and this was not the porpouse of our dinner.As a client who have spent more than £100 I was pretending a better service and also more consideration from the FOH.Macellaio was on our bucket list for such a long time because we knew the brand and the quality of food and wine but after this experience I will never book again on this branch and will not also recommend that.
98: Review: Der Service ist hervorragend, alle sind sehr freundlich und immer da, um alle Wünsche zu erfüllen! Das Essen war hervorragend, wir haben uns gewünscht noch nicht satt zu sein, damit wir noch einmal hätten essen können. Sehr gemütlich, alles in allem - immer wieder!!!
99: Title: Hands Down the best Steak Restaurant on this planet!

Review: I went to Marcellaio with my two adult sons during our NFL Football Weekend in London in 2018. The location is fantastic, the wine (we chose a nice Barolo Saglietti) was fantastic and the meat ... oh.my.god. I will try hard to eat there every time I am in or around London, as this is my world favourite Restaurant.
100: Review: If you’re looking for top quality meat steaks in London this is the red right adress. We had the T-bone fiorentina steak for two, and wow Tender beef, prepared on the point,good wine selection, nice variety of starters (go for the lardo bruschetta), meat is amazing, classic side dishes (spinach could be prepared a but spicier) not cheap but definitely worth it. Very good and attentive service, two thumbs up for Morena. You completed our evening.
101: Review: Nous avons trouvé ce restaurant grâce aux avis de TripAdvisor...et n'avons pas regretté.Tous les plats que nous avons pris étaient très bons et la pièce de boeuf d'une qualité exceptionnelle.La jeune serveuse italienne parlant français d'une extrême gentillesse ainsi que tout le personnel.Nous recommandons..
102: Review: We couldn't wait to get back to this steakhouse and it did not disappoint. The steak tartare was as brilliant as it was at our previous visit and the beef heart was delicious too. We will always have a meal at Macellaio when we are in London. The Manager Mario runs a great operation.
103: Review: Très bon italien Bon service avec une sicilienne parlant très bien françaisCarte réduite Trop chaud salle étage par contre .Un très bon moment .Près de Blackfriars Road
104: Review: Specializing as an Italian steakhouse, this place can be a little hard to find, since it is down an alley (easy walk from the Southwark tube stop). Interesting presentation as the server will drive a steak knife into the table right in front of you.. They dry-age their own steak which is both good and not so good. If you want a steak medium, you need to order a cut thick enough to allow them to make it medium. Too much for one person, but since they cut it for you, I would recommend that you order a steak big enough to share with two or three. The lamb steak and the chicken is delicious. The host was very nice, and explained everything. The sides can be variable. Yes...it's expensive.
105: Title: Bella atmosfera e carni ottime

Review: Avevamo intenzione di fare tappa in uno dei ristoranti Macellaio di Londra dopo aver visto una puntata di 4 ristoranti e abbiamo optato per questo davvero vicino alla metro prenotando attraverso Trip. Abbiamo cenato accanto slla vetrina della cella dove vengono frollate le carni in una bella atmosfera e serviti da personale italiano giovane cortese e attento. La pissa ligure servitaci per antipasto era buona ma il condimento era troppo freddo. Squisite le carni di ottima qualità e buoni anche i dessert. Inavvicinabili i vini per i prezzi, abbiamo optato per una buona moretti alla spina. Prezzi buoni per Londra, altino per noi (50 sterline a testa). Comunque consigliato
106: Review: Come dicono qui a Londra : è un locale cool. Realizzato sotto gli archi della metro, in una zona a sud della City ma molto frequentata attualmente e piena di locali alla moda. Atmosfera giusta, il rito del macellaio che si perpetua sull’altare, musica perfetta e tavoli di legno, dove vengono piantati i coltelli da bistecca.Abbiamo preso uno dei loro piatti top, la costata , cotta e poi presentata sotto forma di tagliata. Buona ma non strepitosa. La focaccia al formaggio stile ligure invece l’ho trovata mal cotta e nulla a che fare con la bontà tipica a Recco.Conto elevato in relazione alla qualità.
107: Review: Estivemos nesse restaurante em um grupo de amigos e a experiência não poderia ter sido melhor!!!! Fomos 3 vezes durante nossa estada em Londres e posso assegurar que todas foram ótimas . Restaurante casual, com atendentes atenciosos, falando inglês, italiano e espanhol. A comida é um capítulo à parte. As entradas ótimas , comemos a burrata com focaccia al formaggio. Prato , Costata del macellaio e sobremesa a panacotta incrível. Vinhos e espumantes ótimos. Custo médio por casal 80 libras, que valem cada pound.
108: Review: Love the vibe in this place! The meat is amazingly cooked and the staff are very kind. Slightly overpriced, but i guess it’s London so it’s okay. Make sure you book a table fills up fast on weekends
109: Title: Sehr leckeres und familienfreundliches Restaurant

Review: Wir waren mit unseren einjährigen Sohn für Ostern in Macellaio und wurden sehr freundlich empfangen. Das Essen und vorallem das Fleisch und die Pisa waren auf einem hohem Niveau vorbereitet. Liegt in einen Künstlerviertel in London.
110: Review: Meet is very good, although a bit pricey. Foccaccia was also very nice. Only downside was that it is way too hot, like a lot. They explained it was because of the pizza oven, but it was very unpleasant.
111: Review: Da grandi fan di 4 ristoranti non potevamo venire a toccare con mano e con la lingua quanto visto in trasmissione.Locale molto tranquillo, un po' difficile da trovare perché nascosto tra altri locali di questo quartiere. Personale molto cortese, quasi tutto italiano e anche se le cameriere sono giovanissime, sono comunque piuttosto attente a seguire le esigenze del cliente.Raramente abbiamo mangiato carne così buona! Mettete in conto... il conto..., del resto siamo a Londra (città non certo economica) e la carne è super selezionata.
112: Title: An Italian meat specialist, beef in particular

Review: If you would like a beef-experience this is the place to go to. I went with an Italian friend and we had a T-bone between the two of us. Truly excellent. There are plenty of other things to choose from and a good bakery on the first floor but Piedmontese beef is their speciality. Definitely worth a visit.
113: Review: Mai come questa volta mi trovo in difficoltà sulla recensione da scrivere.Forse perché mi aspettavo qualcosa di diverso.Partiamo dalle cose importanti per me: qualità del cibo superba.Prezzo onesto e giusto soprattutto considerando che parliamo di un ristorante molto famoso.Personale cortese ma inesperto. Ma questo a Londra e un problema generale dovuto alla scarsa e poco professionalità del personale, sopratutto importato, che si offre in cerca di un lavoro.Quindi atmosfera “fredda” ripeto per un ristorante dove ti aspetti “calore”.Abbiamo dovuto aspettare più di un’ora per la carne e onestamente è un po’ tanto.
114: Title: Deludente! Servizio lento e porzioni baby

Review: Carne buona ma quantità veramente scarse. Il servizio è veramente da migliorare. Personale giovane e non preparato ma soprattutto lento e non attento. Abbiamo dovuto chiedere le cose più volte e comunque non le hanno portate. Il pane no comment: 5 fettine per 5 persone. La pissa la eviterei se fossi in voi. Sicuramente si può fare meglio!!!Precisate di non farvi sedere sopra il ballatoio perché non si respira per caldo e poca aspirazione.
115: Review: Returned as we were so impressed last time and were not disappointed. The meat is really very good. I wanted the fiorentina but they dont do for one as such a large piece of meat. I certainly enjoyed my fillet - you barely need a knife. The Saniscalco primitivo wine accompanied our choices well. Service friendly and helpful.
116: Review: Conosciuto grazie alle trasmissione di Borghese “4 Ristoranti” , in viaggio a Londra lo avevo messo tra le mete da visitare e sono rimasto davvero contento.Buonissime le tartarre ed ottima la costata di Fassona.Buonissimo anche il ragù.Se devo trovargli una pecca, riguarda la temperatura di servizio dei vini.Il vino scelto è arrivato a tavola un po’ troppo caldo
117: Title: Excellent customer service and amazing steak

Review: One of the best fillet steaks around and staff is very attentive and went out of their way to make our evening a lovely one. On my most recent visit, they recommended we try something new and since we were not thrilled with it at the end we got an extra fillet steak for free (which is what we originally wanted to order before their recommendation). Not to say their recommendation was not good, but we just mentioned we still preferred the fillet steak, so got it as 'desert' :) Highly recommended!
118: Review: My friend and I,we had a dinner last Sunday, March the 31st.During the meal, the main course came at the table and we didn’t have the plates and I asked the waiter to bring as 4 plates to share the Pasta, and I had to remind him again for the 2nd time because he forgot to bring them.At 11pm I asked for a Crema Fritta as dessert and the waiter after a couple of minutes came back and said that the kitchen was closed.After that I asked for an espresso and again after a couple of minutes she came back again telling me that the coffee machine was switched off.Am I say, I went quite often to other “Macellaio” in Clapham, Tottenham Court Road and so on, this one at Southwark was the first time, and I had to travel all the way down from White City.I think this isn’t the right service that a guest should get.I don’t think I would go back especially because it takes me so long to get there, and then, for the service provided?It’s “Not Worth It”.
119: Review: We were staying nearby in a hotel and looking for a restaurant. Luckely we found this one. What a great food and even better service. As soon as we are back in London we will return.
120: Title: Unique setting and great food

Review: We visited here twice in a week. The setting is unique and really fun. How unusual these days to find a restaurant where you can actually talk to your companions and hear each other! This small restaurant is attractive and the food (small menu) is super. The waitstaff and manager were extremely attentive and the wine was great. We LOVED IT!
121: Review: Abbiamo scelto questo ristorante perché vicino al ns hotel e ben recensito! Confermo le ottime recensioni! Abbiamo visto solo il piano terra del locale: piccolo ma estremamente caratteristico con tavolata unica molto grande (il rischio / fortuna è di condividere la cena con perfetti sconosciuti) con vista su tavolo macelleria e cucina! Personale gentilissimo di madrelingua italiana: ci hanno consigliato davvero bene! Abbiamo preso una schiacciata al formaggio da condividere in 2 e a testa una tagliata di carne con le patate, il tutto accompagnato da un ottimo bicchiere di rosso! Prezzo in linea con i costi di una città non economica. Unica pecca: tutti i ns vestiti a fine cena avevano l’odore delle pietanze mangiate! Consigliato se in valigia / nell’armadio avete un cambio per il giorno dopo..
122: Review: Siamo andati in questo ristorante consigliati da un ‘amicaAbbiamo mangiato della carne Piemontese a dir poco fantastica locale accogliente personale sorridente e professionale ti spiegano la provenienza e la lavorazione della loro carneConsigliato Anzi tappa obbligata se si passa per Londra
123: Review: We visited Macellaio Rc Union Street 5 days ago. The restaurant has a nice atmosphere and the stuff is extremely polite. The food is OK but the portions are ridiculusly tiny and therefore rather expensive.
124: Review: Nothing to really complain about but nothing to write home about either.We had skirt stake which had been cooked for five hours sous vide and was more or less tasteless and not even especially tender. The house merlot was good.Service was attentive, as one might expect as there was only one other table occupied in this large restaurant.
125: Review: Cena con il mio ragazzo per il suo compleanno, carne di ottima qualità e servizio gentilissimo oltre che simpatico!! Prezzi più che giusti per la qualità di cibo che si sta mangiando, location movimentata, anyway molto bella e caratteristica!! Consigliato sinceramente
126: Review: dans un restaurant rempli au tiers le service est très très lent a commencer par la prise de la commande. une équipe de 4 qui semblent inattentive a ses clients.les plats sont corrects mais sans plus. assez déçu par la charcuterie et la taille des portions pour les pâtes.
127: Review: Was hoping this would be more as I live in the area, but how disappointing. The service is really slow. Took over 15 minutes to get a waiter to take just a drinks order. Drinks arrived half way through the meal. The portions are teeny tiny and the prices are hearty. We weren’t offered any more drinks because the waitress disappeared for most of the evening. Left feeling very hungry having spent over £100 for 2 people. Won’t be going back. The Charlotte across the road has better food, service and value.
128: Review: Siamo stati dal Macellaio attirati da quanto visto nella trasmissione di Borghese e le nostre aspettative non sono state deluse. Personale tutto italiano, competenti e gentili, le materie prime sono eccellenti e la spesa è adeguata a quello che abbiamo mangiato. Leggermente alto il prezzo dei vini ma a Londra ci può stare. Sicuramente ci torneremo! Complimenti!!
129: Review: The staff are super friendly, atmosphere great, food delicious. A proper Italian staffed by Italians. Grazie tutti.
130: Review: La mia è stata un' esperienza strana, sono partito da Firenze verso Londra e la sera sono stato in questo ristorante, portato da colleghi che lo conoscevano, a mangiare una bistecca alla fiorentina. All'inizio confesso che ero scettico, ma ho subito trovato un'atmosfera piacevole ed accogliente. La carne era di prima qualità. Fassona piemontese, come ci hanno tenuto subito a precisare, e non Chianina, ma per me non è stato un problema, sia perché apprezzo molto la carne piemontese, sia perché la bistecca è stata decisamente superlativa. Contorni, carta dei vini e servizio sono stati all'altezza della bistecca. Un' esperienza decisamente piacevole che consiglio. Non posso dire niente del rapporto qualità/prezzo perché ero ospite.
131: Review: Quando mangiare carne diventa un vero piacere, sei dal Macellaio union street,. Camminando in Londra e sostare per uno spuntino da un kg di costata è veramente fantastico. Servizio ottimo, prodotti eccezionali. Lo consiglio
132: Review: Ottimo ristorante carne eccezionale e dolci sublimi pizza al formaggio veramente splendida e molta varietà di vini anche se un po' cari ma servizio è qualità eccellenti
133: Review: Came here for lunch - soup o the day (pumpkin soup) was tasteless and pasta (tagliatelle al ragu) very salty. Left feeling hungry - portions are small, prices are high for what you get. Won't be coming back.
134: Review: Dopo vari tentativi siamo riusciti a prenotare un tavolo in questo ristorante italiano. Ci aspettavamo di mangiare bene e non ci hanno deluso. Un pranzo completo, dagli antipasti al dolce è stato tutto perfetto. Formaggi e salumi di altissima qualità. Abbiamo richiesto un bis di crudo e lardo di colonnata in quanto erano strepitosi. Tagliatelle alla bolognese davvero ottime (pasta fatta da loro). Sulla carne raggiungiamo il massimo del punteggio. Abbiamo ordinato diversi tagli così da provarli tutti. Dalla Fiorentina alla costata fino ad arrivare al filetto. Tutto squisito e cucinato a regola d'arte. I dolci poi sono stati una conferma della qualitá di questo ristorante. Il conto naturalmente è rapportato alla qualità. Per i turisti che vogliono provare il macellaio consiglio di provare a prenotare in anticipo (magari anche prima di partire) in particolar modo per la cena. Servizio discreto e professionale. Un consiglio......quando portano i coltelli per la carne siete pregati di non fare movimenti bruschi :)
135: Review: Abbiamo mangiato divinamente, gli affettati sono squisiti, la pasta é come se la mangi in Italia, ottimi i dolci, ma la carne é qualcosa di veramente eccelsa, assolutamente da provare.
136: Review: Tappa fissa quando andiamo a Londra. Sempre una sicurezza e tutto perfetto. Lo consiglio vivamente. Bistecca da favola, ma anche la focaccia al formaggio è ottima.
137: Review: Siamo andati per curiosità, dopo avere visto la trasmissione tv 4 ristoranti.Siamo stati accolti con estrema gentilezza ... il personale è per la maggior parte italiano e non abbiamo avuto problemi ad intenderci. Abbiamo preso come antipasto una pissa al prosciutto ottima. Siamo poi passati ad una superba costata accompagnata da contorni al forno. Full, non ci stava più nulla se non un buon caffè! Il locale è moto bello, c’è una ottima atmosfera. Il servizio è molto curato e veloce. Prezzo non troppo salato per Londra e per la qualità dei prodotti. Il manager del locale e il personale molto gentili.Consiglio!
138: Review: Serata in amicizia.. accolti da subito alla porta in maniera impeccabile!!locale pulito e ben curato( complimenti al manager)Ci accomodiamo alla sala sopra.. ci accoglie Jacopo e ci illustra il menu e ci consiglia cosa assaggiare..Abbiamo mangiato dalla pissa alla carne ed è uscito tutto perfetto.. piatti impeccabili!! (Complimenti allo chef!)Atmosfera giovanile.. simpatica e brillante!Bravi!
139: Review: Arrivati nel locale troviamo subito in accoglienza ottima al dire la verità, volevamo mangiare la Fiorentina ma il cameriere ci ha consigliato la costata...cosa dire la carne puzzava di marcio. Abbiamo avuto un indigestione a causa vostra, quanto un prodotto non è più buono per servirlo ai clienti, dovete farmi altro uso ho altrimenti buttarlo. Vergogna!!
140: Review: Nous avons été dans ce restaurant tout à fait par hasard et quelle magnifique surprise. J'ai pris une foccacia et mon conjoint des gnocchis et les deux plats étaient excellents. Le restaurant est très bien décoré et les serveurs très aimables.
141:
Review: Recensioni stellate “meritate”.
Prezzo di fascia alta ma proporzionato alla qualità.
Nessun rimpianto, anzi, torneremo sicuramente.
142: Review: Abbiamo visitato il locale “Il macellaio” incuriositi dalla vittoria del programma di Alessandro Borghese, davvero meritata!Il locale è accogliente (anche se assai buio al piano superiore), il servizio è impeccabile e il prezzo è giusto.I piatti sono ricercati e di alta qualità, serviti però in porzioni davvero ridotte.Ottimi i piatti: dai primi ai dolci.Tornerò sicuramente durante il mio prossimo viaggio a Londra!
143: Review: Questo locale ,premiato da Borghese nel noto programma merita in tutto;ambiente e qualità.Tutto davvero buono e di grande qualità.La tappa dove mangio meglio a Londra,secondo i miei gusti,e dove ritorno anno per anno durante le mie vacanze a Londra
144: Review: Non sappiamo davvero come descrivere questa cena. Noi non mangiamo mai italiano all’estero, siamo andati in questo ristorante su suggerimento di parenti che ci erano già stati, mai consiglio fu migliore. Ho prenotato qualche mese prima chiedendo un piccolo aperitivo ed un messaggio da far trovare sul tavolo per il mio ragazzo, inutile dire che sono andati oltre le mie aspettative (messaggio su un foglio in stile pergamena e bicchiere di vino bianco meraviglioso, buonissimo).La cena è stata fantastica, prodotti di alta qualità, italiani (le etichette erano bene in vista), pasta al dente, carne ottima, vino indescrivibile. I dolci.. WOW! Personale gentilissimo, simpatico e moooolto paziente. Un ristorante che merita davvero di avere una buona, ottima, grandiosa fortuna! Staff giovane, caloroso, molto attento al cliente. Prezzi ottimi, specialmente se rapportati ai prodotti (sottolineo nuovamente, italiani) offerti.Super soddisfatti di tutto, dai prodotti al servizio, dalla location al conto.Torneremo sicuramente la prossima volta che saremo a Londra.E a chi vuole mangiare bene a Londra ANDATE AL MACELLAIO!
145: Review: Siamo stati a cena per il 31 dicembre: qualità e servizio davvero top con materie prime di prima scelta. Impeccabile e cortese il servizio. Per essere a Londra i prezzi sono giusti mentre non vi aspettate porzioni italiane. Notevole la “pissa” una sorta di focaccia con formaggio e buona la pasta. La carne è top e puoi scegliere il peso. Abbiamo avuto un problema con un filetto troppo cotto subito risolto con cortesia e velocità. Se passate a londra fateci decisamente un salto e mettete in preventivo intorno ai 40 pounds a persona.
146: Review: We booked here after having watched the Italian program ‘4 ristoranti’ and being intrigued by the menu proposed. Our expectations were fully met, such an amazing quality! We had the focaccia ligure (only stracchino cheese, as the original Italian one) and battuta as starters. Absolute great taste for both. We shared a 1kg fassona Fiorentina steak...flavour and tenderness second to none, you really have to try. We enjoyed the Latte Fritto dessert, never tried before and definitely a good new taste. The bill was at level we expected, this is not a cheap place but as always in high restaurant level you have to pay for excellence. It was our dinner for our romantic duo weekend in London so it fully worths !
147: Review: Siamo stati il 26/12 a cena in questo posto....che dire,tutto fantastico....carne buonissima(costata da 1.2 kg)tenera come il burro e cotta alla perfezione, accompagnata da buoni contorni,dolci ottimo e conto nella media per essere a Londra....da tornare
148: Review: Pour notre dernier soir à Londres nous avons choisi de nous faire plaisir et aucuns regrets tout était excellent du début à la fin. Merci à toute l équipe qui a été très agréable.
149: Review: Cena sabato sera in famiglia, locale molto bello, carne ottima come piatto forte, pissa (tipo pizza) fatta con il pane della pizza molto buona. Personale gentilissimo e bravi nella gestione. Complimenti
150: Review: Under my friend advice I tookMy father here while he was visiting London. The service was great! We received attention and we were very much looked after! The beef and wine were amazing w took cooked meat as well as raw meat. We went for a 1.2 kg steak to share between the 3 of us and it was so soft that we couldCut it with the forkAlmost! Unfortunately I was too full to try the desert, but they looked very good! The down side was the pizza as starter... it was thin(good), but not enough cooked and it is because I believe it should cook in contact with the Oven rather than in the tray otherwise it will never cook properly. Overall it was a great experience! I will be back!
151: Review: Locale accattivante con ospitalità eccellente! Sevizio molto valido e soprattutto cucina con uso di materia prima fantastica! Davvero un’esperienza -positiva con un rapporto qualità prezzo interessante in una città come Londra!
152: Review: There is something funny about the meat in this restaurant. We left feeling very disappointed. It was low quality, especially the fillet steak, which was pale, tough tasteless, and sinewy. Despite pointing this out, we got more of the same. See the pictures. It looks like veal, but has the texture of a pork chop.Portions are measly and overpriced.Spent 140 pounds for 2.
153: Review: Il macellaio sicuramente è il miglior ristorante di carne di Londra veramente una carne deliziosa dopo una frollatura 9 settimane!!Abbiamo ordinato una bistecca di 1,1 kg per tre persone cotta al punto giusto è servita su un piatto di ghisa, che dire saporitissima è tenerissima, gli antipasti carpaccio di manzo e bruschette con lardo deliziosi, con tartare di manzo al gorgonzola ottima.Unica pecca è la focaccia con formaggio secondo i miei gusti troppo cruda !! Per il resto tutto buono da provare per chi ama la carne!!!
154: Review: With friends for a pre-theatre dinner. Shared marrow bones, beef tartar, beef tripes, gnocchi, hanger steak. All excellent, tasty and well presented. Very good choice of wines.
155: Review: Une très bonne viande certes parfaitement cuite mais à part cela malheureusement pas grand chose. Pour être honnête il y avait une grande tablée mais tout de même : des frites sèches, une burrata quelconque, un service inexistant sauf au moment de payer l’addition...pourquoi pas car cadre sympa mais peut mieux faire surtout à Londres !
156: Review: Piccolo ristorante... prettamente griglieria!! Carne ottima, un burro, una morbidezza... da provare veramente!! Qualita' prezzo molto buona!! Personale italiano, gentili e cortesi.. il ristorante molto carino.. orgoglio italiano top!!
157: Review: Went for lunch. Had a great waiter who explained about the steaks. You choose the aged beef and then choose the weight. The steak was excellently cooked a proper medium rare. The wine list is extensive - all Italian. The cheesecake pudding was a fine end to the meal. Great food and service.
158: Review: Ristorante bello, si mangia ottima carne. Suggerisco costata dry aged. Rapporto qualità/prezzo ottimo.
159: Review: Mantiene sempre un alto livello qualitativo proponendo in una location molto curata un menù di classe e semplicità.Servizio di buon livello.Conto medio
160: Review: Very cool place for a magnific dinner with a really tasty fiorentina. The restaurant is very nice and the italian food deserves a visit.
161: Title: Portions of main course more like a starter

Review: The place is quirky and different and the staff are nice although the waiter seemed to be pushing us to purchase the most expensive food on the menu which was uncomfortable.The portion of the stake I ordered was tiny more like a starter and very pricey, would recommend but expect small portions.
162: Review: I had the basic rump at £16 which did not touch the sides. The quality was good and it was cooked to my liking.They didn't have much to offer in the way of juices and soft drinks.I am not rushing back.
163: Review: Carne ottima, pizza al formaggio di piccole dimensioni ma molto buona, tagliata tenerissima, tartare non meritano molto, costata invece si. Prezzo piuttosto elevato ma merita almeno una cena.
164: Review: Noch selten hab ich so gut gegessen!Mit einem Gruss aus der Küche wurden wir zum Start verwöhnt! Danach folgte Focaccia als Vorspeise und zum Hauptgang ein köstlich, zartes Steak! Perfekt auf den Punkt gebraten!Das Dessert schloss unseren Schlemmerabend perfekt ab!Das Ambiente ist schlicht wundervoll. Hatten einen Tisch im Obergeschoss. Das Restaurant wurde in einen Bogen der Bahnbrücke gebaut!!Fazit: Bester Italiener in town!!
165: Review: These guys deserve a 10/10: great and relaxed location, amazing food (I come from Genoa and I can't believe I've found a place in London where to eat Focaccia and Focaccia Al Formaggio), and super staff (Emanuele has been very nice and professional during our dinner).Macellaio RC is now definitely on my list of favourite restaurants...well done and see you soon!!
166: Title: Mangiato bene ma fuori mercato per il suo target e la zona .

Review: Mangiato discretamente , ottima la focaccia e la “pissa” . Costata buona ...però il prezzo neanche un chianina a ponte vecchio ! Un consiglio : mangiate solo la pissa e la focaccia altrimenti i prezzi salgono alle stelle .
167: Review: Spinti dalla curiosità dopo aver visto il ristorante in televisione e dalle tante recensioni positive, abbiamo scelto questa location per festeggiare un compleanno durante la nostra prima serata in città e ne siamo rimasti decisamente soddisfatti.Locale molto carino e caratteristico situato in un bellissimo quartiere, servizio ottimo, ma soprattutto carne da leccarsi i baffi, accompagnata da focacce e dolci molto buoni.Il conto ovviamente è rapportato ai prezzi della città, troppo cari i vini.
168: Title: Excellent food, very casual atmosphere

Review: Unlike the South Kensington venue, this Macellaios looks like a fast-casual diner. The place is very large, set over two floors, and the atmosphere is not intimate.The food remains delicious, as in other venues. They specialise in meaty dishes, and also have delicious wines and good desserts.Recommendations:- Pissas- Foccacias- Burrata- Battuta All’Albese (although it does not come with truffle like in Italy)- Bone marrow (they add some kind of beef tartare on the usual marrow)- Beef Fillet- Rump steak- Fennel and orange salad- Mash potato - TiramisuLess amazing:- Fassona Bresaola (quite pricey for literally 4 slices)- Spinach side (nothing special)- Green tea pannacotta
169: Review: Sempre carne al top! Servizio eccellente, qualità del cibo ottima. Ero nel tavolone centrale, bella esperienza!
170: Review: Davvero una scoperta questo ristorante. Carne davvero buona e camerieri prontissimi a consigliarti! Da segnalare il purè strepitoso! Consigliato!
171: Title: Ten Stars should be an Option

Review: Being South African we are accustomed to eating particularly delicious meat so it takes a lot to impress us. We were beyond impressed with the team at Macellaio. The service was outstanding and the food was so good that we ordered a second portion of steak tartar, not because we were hungry, it was simply magnificent.The Italian white wine on offer just didn't blow us away so the team patiently bought bottle after bottle for us to try until we found one that we did like. If you have cut back or simply only go out for celebration meals then make a point of putting this gem on the top of your list. Best rib eye steak I have ever eaten.
172: Review: We have been few days ago in the evening... Nice bakery with fresh pissa but the best plate is the meat.Fiorentina is amazing ,fresh and top quality. Price a bit expensive but if you like the quality you will be more than happy. Good wine selectionThanks to Aurora and Alessandro in particular to attend us.
173: Review: In occasione del mio onomastico ho avuto la fortuna di visitare questo Ristorante: vincitore della puntata a Londra del programma “4 Ristoranti” con lo chef Alessandro Borghese. Nato da un’idea di Roberto Costa (nel 2012) è un “butcher concept” nel cuore di Southwark. E, se posso dirlo, un pezzetto del mio cuore questo posto lo ha conquistato. 100%Booking via web, siamo stati ricontattati telefonicamente da un ragazzo estremamente educato e cordiale per riconfermare i dettagli della prenotazione. Appena arrivati: un’atmosfera moderna e sofisticata, familiare ed accogliente allo stesso tempo... con un gran Teatro che ospita il Macellaio e carni di qualità eccelsa. Accomodati al piano superiore siamo stati prontamente accolti da Maurizio (Manager & Sommelier) e da Aurora. Non avremmo potuto sperare di meglio!! Dopo un aperitivo Aperol Spritz abbiamo assaggiato un favoloso trittico (steak tartare-battuta all’albese-battuta al Gorgonzola gustosissimo e delicato) consigliatoci da Aurora; lingua e focaccia. Ha fatto da padrona la nostra T-Bone: razza Fassona macellata rigorosamente dopo i 4anni e frollata 6-9 settimane; come spiegatoci con perizia e professionalità da Maurizio. Desserts favolosi: pannacotta al basilico e DolceLatte come da puntata in Tv. Abbiamo poi avuto l’occasione di visitare il “Teatro” e di rubare qualche scatto che lascio qui con la recensione. :) GRAZIE. Veramente di quella che posso considerare ad oggi la MIGLIOR ESPERIENZA CULINARIA. EVER!!
174: Review: We had dinner here with a party of 14. Starters were superb, main course was still good but less so. Desert was also good. All in all a place to recommend and I will come back
175: Review: Non sono solito andare nei "nuovi" ristoranti italiani, ma qui a Londra Macellaio Rc entra sicuramente a far parte della mia top 5. Prezzo leggermente alto ma rapportato all'altissima qualità della pasta (fatta in casa) e della carne, a dir poco ottima. Ottimo ambiente, anche all'esterno con un divanetto dove si può fumare un sigaro e fare due chiacchiere dopo cena.
176: Review: Arrivati in questo ristorante quasi per caso. Antipasti buoni, da Genovese devo dire che la focaccia al formaggio era veramente ottima. Costata di ottima qualità.Personale competente e simpatico. Prezzo adeguato
177: Review: Ottima cucina (non solo la carne), location di stile, servizio attento e premuroso ma non affettato, conto sopra la media ma giustificato dalla qualità. Bravi!
178: Review: Would recommend going without great expectations. Restaurant with a bar counter. Meat was really amazing - prosciutto and skirt steak. Portions are quite small, I would recommend ordering an appetizer or a side dish. Seating is quite cramped, we got a table right next to the staffs passageway (old floor vibrating all the time, got the feeling of being on the way constantly) in a nearly empty restaurant.
179: Review: This restaurant looked promising. The decor is nice and the meat display impressive. We didn't book and consequently sat at the sharing table. Being a group of four we sat two across from one another, but thanks to the bizarre runway down the middle, we were so far away from the other couple we couldn't really converse. We moved to a square table when one became available without much fuss.The house wine had a faint fizziness which was unpleasant, but what was most disappointing were the size of the portions. Now, I am not a proponent of enormous portion sizes but the portion of the pesto pasta I had would barely fill a child. And I don't think the quality of the ingredients warrants the portion size. Just make it bigger and charge more! The rest of our party did thoroughly enjoy their steaks, but not wanting to order a barrage of sides, also left hungry.The service and food was good, but the meal was overpriced.
180: Review: Locale simpatico, arredato con originalità posto sotto gli archi della ferrovia. Servizio rapido e menù di carne di ottima qualità.
181: Review: The menu featured Italian items, but be forewarned it’s not traditional Italian.  One dish was very good (the gnocchi).  My spouse had the ravioli and stated it tasted like something from a can.  Worth a try though.
182: Review: un po difficile da trovare in un angusta stradina molto "figa" però, con diversi localini. Questo ristorante mi ha soddisfatto sia per il servizio sia per il cibo. certo non è economico ... un appunto che posso fare e che la porzione della tagliata potrebbe essere leggermente piu abbondante.... focaccia da 10 e lode, carne buona e ben presentata dolci buoni ... il caffe... beh lasciamo stare :) , personale cordiale ed attivo . servizio automatico del 12.5% nella norma.alla prossima...
183: Review: Io e la mia famiglia, in viaggio a Londra, abbiamo prenotato in questo ristorante dopo aver visto la trasmissione di Alessandro Borghese. Focaccia al formaggio, costata con patatine e un ottimo vino ... tutto delizioso.
184: Review: Nous sommes allés mon mari, ma fille et moi dans ce restaurant un peu au hasard après avoir consulté certains avis sur TripAdvisor. Sans réservation.Nous avons été accueillis parfaitement bien par Nina (qui parle un français remarquable) et « Lele ».L’entrée était excellente (2 plats pour nous 3), la viande d’une qualité jamais égalée et les desserts succulents.D’un point de vue rapport qualité / prix :RAS. Prix juste pour une telle qualité.Bref à recommander et encore merci pour l’accueil que nous avons eu. Nous reviendrons.
185: Review: Nous avons passé un très bon moment. La viande était excellente !! Le service était bon.Pour les amateurs de viande, à vos couteaux !
186: Review: I start saying that my expectations were very high, so that’s why I’m a bit disappointed. Arrived at the restaurant we had some issues with the booking as on the system was half an hour later of the real one (it can happen) but still the kept us at the door for few minutes with restaurant half empty. We ordered an aperitif which never arrived, so we ordered a bottle of wine while we were ordering the food. And still we needed to wait 7/8 minutes when the wine fridge was close to us (great bottle by the way). The starters were quite small and ok taste, but the main Costata was actually delicious.Dessert were ok as well, and still I had to order twice my digestive before it arrived.Bill quite expensive. At the end, nice meat but nothing exceptional in the whole experience. If I can give a suggestion staff should be bit more smiling and attentive and it should interact more with guests.
187: Review: Highly recommended (in case you don't read until the end)!I've been there with five friends after seeing it win an award on Italian TV.Great Italian meat, tasteful, tender and delicious in good size portions.The menu is original: mainly meat, but not only.Best looking staff I ever seen.Great place, great atmosphere.Don't miss it.
188: Title: Сервис прекрасный, еда не хуже

Review: Все на высшем уровне: дружелюбные официанты, красивый интерьер.
